page.title: 14LEISURE, CALDER VALE
page.content:
{ Calder Vale Club:}The club opens nearly all day on Saturday and Sunday and every night through the week when it opens at seven o' clock. People go there and they play games such as cards, dominoes, snooker, and darts. On Saturday there is sometimes a group performing.
{Cricket and football:}Cricket is on Sunday afternoons and people fifteen years old and over are allowed to play. There is a cricket field on the edge of the village. Football is on Mondays and Wednesday evenings.
{Women's Institute:}The WI meets on the second Thursday of each month in the village hall. There are about 35 members and it has been going for 53 years.
